alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 27 at 1:25AM PST until December 27 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING FOR THE BASE OF THE NORTHERN BLUE MOUNTAINS OF OREGON... ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning for the base of the northern Blue Mountains of Oregon, southeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts to 65 mph. For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 10 PM PST this evening. For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 7 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon
